lead_paragraph: With his 19th home run, Wil Myers is playing so well that his manager expects him to be San Diego's representative in the All-Star Game at Petco Park on July 12.

headline.print_headline: Myers Stays Hot With 2-Run Homer as Padres Beat Yankees 7-6
headline.main: Myers Stays Hot With 2-Run Homer as Padres Beat Yankees 7-6

snippet: With his 19th home run, Wil Myers is playing so well that his manager expects him to be San Diego's representative in the All-Star Game at Petco Park on July 12....
